description: Rectangular and square hollow sections (HRHS, HSHS, CRHS, CSHS) classification template

subplates.description: Flange (internal element) - accounts for corner radius
Web (internal element) - accounts for corner radius

notes: For RHS/SHS, all elements are internal compression parts
The factor 3*t accounts for corner radius effects
Corner radius typically ro = 2.0*t for hot-formed, variable for cold-formed
For cold-formed sections (CRHS, CSHS), same limits apply
Governing element is typically the longer dimension (web for HRHS)
